::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
   
  Hot Rod watches in horror as he sees Nightlight terminated before him. Hot Rod's thoughts are fast and uncontrolled. No one could possibly know or understand what he is feeling at this moment.
   
  Jhiaxus picks up the Autobot and heads towards the shuttle with him.
   
  Jhiaxus: To torture this prisoner would be an honor...
   
  Zaak is up and walking but is hurt. He mentally calls the Scorponk shell to come sit in the shuttle. Zarak is not far behind.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

Hydras shot and let the clone fall, in that way that the hole that 
the shot did couldnt show that it was a fake. Hydras knew that the 
only way to know that it was a clone, was the absense of the spark's 
container.

And facing at ROdimus said "You're patetic..."

The punched against Roudimus'stomach and looking to the Predacons 
said "Let's go home... Help the wounded, and Jhiaxus if this patetic 
imitation of Autobot gives problem, I strongly suggest that start 
your fun time"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Jhiaxus/Hot Rod::
> 
> Jhiaxus grabs Hot Rod under his arms from behind. He lifts him to 
his feet and hold Hot Rod steady, looking towards Nightlight.
> 
> Jhiaxus: We're about to shatter your world...
> 
> Hot Rod can see 'Nightlight' being lined up apon the tree with 
Hydras standing ready with a blaster.
> 
> Hot Rod tries with all of his energy to move, react and cry out. 
He can not...
> 
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "Hold our new guest, as I promise... this will be fast and I'll 
grant 
> this pawn with the ultimate freedom" said while he pushed the clone 
> against a tree in that way that Rodimus could see his blaster 
aiming 
> against the location that the spark had to be and shot.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > --- Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> > 
> > > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
> > > 
> > > Jhiaxus draws some energon shackles from subspace and binds Hot
> > > Rod's hands behind his back. He also gags him for when the the
> > > effects of Hydras' shot wear off. Finally Jhiaxus attaches a 
> signal
> > > masker to Hot Rod's back, under the right side of his fender.
> > >
> > > Jhiaxus: Centuries of being a damn hero are about to catch up 
> with
> > > you, Auto-fool!
> > 
> > Myrmidon watches the confrontation with a great deal of interest, 
> his
> > optics narrowing curiously. Hot Rod falling this easily seemed 
> almost
> > disappointing. With a slight movement he continued to survey the 
> area,
> > wondering, almost hoping, that Hot Rod had some back up comming. 
> After
> > all, only a fool would go out without alerting his 'friends' that 
he
> > was going into danger. 
> > 
> > Preston
> > (Myrmidon)
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >
